Summary on evaluation of LLM.content: The use of Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT has been evaluated in various fields including computer programming [1], culture [2], academic research and publishing [3], and healthcare [4]. In the evaluation of ChatGPT for computer programming, the model's vast capabilities for code completion, code snippet suggestion, automatic syntax error fixing, and refactoring suggestions were highlighted [1]. Meanwhile, the evaluation of ChatGPT for cultural purposes revealed its potential for generating amusing and entertaining content [2]. On the other hand, while ChatGPT shows potential as a model for the automated preparation of essays and other scholarly manuscripts, ethical concerns were also raised regarding the use of this technology in academia [3]. In healthcare, the feasibility of ChatGPT was also evaluated, indicating the importance of educating users on the appropriate use and potential pitfalls of AI-based LLMs in medicine [4]. Overall, the evaluation of LLMs such as ChatGPT has provided insights into their capabilities, limitations, and potential impact on various fields.
